text: Ogoh ʙos, ki inho musrikon dar zamiri xud kufrro pinhon medorand. Gumon mekunand, ki on ci dar zamiri xud nigoh medorand ʙar Alloh pusida memonad. Ojo namedonand, hangome ki az rui caholatason comahoi xud dar sar mekasand, Alloh medonad on ciro pinhon medorand va on ciro oskor mekunand. Pinhon va oskorason nazdi Alloh ʙaroʙar ast. Caro ki U donoi rozi dilhost
